properties.Name: Auckland City Mission
properties.Description: We work with other agencies and support providers to reduce duplication of services and ensure the best possible outcomes for homeless clients.Staff provide hospitality, support, social interaction and skills development, along with meeting physical needs and addressing long-term issues such as housing, physical and mental health concerns and financial issues.

properties.Name: Emerge Aotearoa
properties.Description: Emerge Aotearoa provides quality social housing that enable people and their whānau to fully participate within their community. Housing is provided to low income people who are eligible for social housing as determined by the Ministry of Social Development. In partnership with Lifewise to develop a tailored ‘Housing First’ model for central Auckland. ‘Housing First’ is an innovative and proven approach to housing people experiencing chronic homelessness.

properties.Name: James Liston Emergency Accommodation
properties.Description: Emergency housing for up to 3 months for men and women who are homeless or at risk of being homeless. Staffed 24/7, $2 laundry, Breakfast & Dinner, along with providing safe clean accommodation, the hostel also provides support and case management services to residents. $88.00 per week for beneficiary, student, pensioner $250 per week non-beneficiary

properties.Name: Lifewise
properties.Description: Youth housing service providing safe housing and support for youth who don’t have a safe or stable place to live. For 16-24-year-olds who either are homeless, at risk of becoming homeless or have a serious housing need.

properties.Name: Vision West
properties.Description: VisionWest Community Housing provides safe, quality, affordable rental accommodation for low income families who cannot access Government supplied accommodation and cannot afford private rental. We offer short term emergency housing and long term accommodation in Auckland

properties.Name: YMCA
properties.Description: Hostel accommodation starting at $17 a night

properties.Name: The Salvation Army - Epsom Lodge Supportive Accommodation
properties.Description: Epsom Lodge provides 12 weeks emergency and transitional housing for men and women. Support and aftercare provided.

properties.Name: The Salvation Army - Glen Eden Housing for 55+
properties.Description: The Salvation Army has 283 accommodation units for those aged 55+ throughout New Zealand.  These units provide an essential service for the low income elderly.Please contact us about applying for one of these units.

properties.Name: The Salvation Army - Transitional Housing - Manurewa
properties.Description: Short term transitional housing available for men and women. If you need shelter and help to get your life back on track please contact us directly.
